sentences.english: Made of natural coconut, keep your lovely pets growing with healthy and fun.
sentences.chinese: 純天然椰殼製成，保證愛寵健康快樂成長。

sentences.english: Coconut Shell Charcoal is fired by the shell of coco, its form is lumpish or mealy .
sentences.chinese: 椰殼炭化料是由椰殼燒製而成，其形狀爲塊狀或粉狀。

sentences.english: Coconut Shell Charcoal is fired by the shell of coco, its form is lumpish or mealy .
sentences.chinese: 椰殼炭化料是由椰殼燒製而成，其形狀爲塊狀或粉狀。

sentences.english: After full destroying, separates the coconut tree brown textile fiber and the coconut shell powder automatically.
sentences.chinese: 經充分打碎後，自動分離椰棕纖維及椰殼粉。

sentences.english: Jack took up a coco-nut shell that brimmed with fresh water and drank.
sentences.chinese: 傑克拿起一隻盛滿清水的椰殼一飲而盡。
